name: nha-toi-erp
description: Hệ thống quản lý quán ăn - Nhà Tôi ERP

scripts.db:push: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run restart
scripts.restart: pm2 delete all && pkill -9 -f 'node dist/main' || true && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && pm2 save
